sections.content:
**“How do I start trading?”**

> Focus on learning the basics first! Go to Isaac’s youtube channel and tune in to all his FREE educational content! 
> 
> https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqTDJKEl_rbjKBbSVpRK28Q


**“What trading platform should I use to trade?”**

Best Beginner Platform - 

> **Webull : **https://a.webull.com/FvOESR7XOH1xUNZHpu

Best Platform for International Traders  - 

> **Interactive Brokers** - https://www.interactivebrokers.com/en/index.php?f=1338&gclid=CjwKCAjw2rmWBhB4EiwAiJ0mtbW88FNIQ5XuqjHxzwMu4txPlSHTKFjggYno72RSeLTTlcDjSH3kYhoCsLEQAvD_BwE

> **Tastyworks** - https://tastyworks.com/


Best Platform for Advanced Traders - 

> **TD Ameritrade** - https://www.tdameritrade.com/



**“How much do I need to start trading?”**

> You do not need much, Isaac started with $150, but for some it’s best to save up money and use the time to learn. 
> 
> During the saving phase you can **“paper trade”** (trading with fake money) so you are not completely sidelined while you are saving. 
> 
> You can paper trade using the **Webull** app posted above
> 
> Complete this channel after learning the basics! 👉🏽 <#1131773042834542672>

@everyone
